Public Remarks: Older farm home on 5 acres of pristine farm land. Situated on Nicomen Island just 10 minutes from Mission City, this high, dry land is currently used for fodder and grain. There is a Quonset Hut-style workshop and an old blacksmith shop on the property, and the sand point well produces plenty of good water; the pump was replaced fairly recently. This is a property on which a family could easily become self-sufficient. Located on a quiet, dead-end road, the home is currently rented to excellent long-term tenants. Please call for a private viewing.
